TRAILERS

by
July 15, 2025
Source: YouTube

"If it is murder, then the killer is still onboard." Hulu has debuted a new official US trailer for their release of the thriller series Red Eye, arriving for streaming in the US on Hulu starting this July. Made by Sony TV in the UK, this first played on ITVX in the UK in April last year. They're already working on Season 2 while everyone in the US catches up with the first six intense episodes. Not to be confused with horror cult classic film Red Eye (2005) with Cillian Murphy & Rachel McAdams. The series takes place during an all-night flight between London & Beijing after a British man is extradited to China on suspicion of murder. London police officer DC Hana Li is escorting Matthew Nolan back to Beijing where he has been accused of a crime. However, on board flight 357, she finds herself embroiled in an escalating conspiracy and a growing number of murders. This stars Jing Lusi as Detective Hana Li, Richard Armitage as Dr. Matthew Nolan, along with Lesley Sharp, Jemma Moore, Dan Li, Cash Holland, Tai Yin Chan, & many other passengers. This also reminds me of the other airplane thriller series Hijack with Idris Elba out recently. Tray tables up.

Here's the official US trailer (+ teaser poster) for Peter A. Dowling's series Red Eye, from Hulu's YouTube:

A red eye flight underway from London to Beijing becomes a thrilling journey after Dr. Matthew Nolan (Richard Armitage) is arrested and accused of murdering a woman. Despite protesting his innocence, London Police Officer, DC Hana Li (Jing Lusi), is tasked with escorting Dr. Nolan back to Beijing to face charges — but after an incident occurs on-board, she finds herself embroiled in an escalating conspiracy. Red Eye is a thriller series created by British writer Peter A. Dowling, also writer of the screenplays for Flightplan, Stag Night, Reasonable Doubt, Sacrifice, Black & Blue, and the "Transformers: Rescue Bots Academy" series. With writing by Peter A Dowling and Jingan Young. And with episodes directed by Kieron Hawkes and Camilla Strøm Henriksen. Produced by Kristian Dench and Letitia Knight. Made by Bad Wolf and Sony Pictures Television. This originally aired on ITVX in the UK starting in April 2024 last year. Hulu will debut the Red Eye series streaming in the US starting on July 22nd, 2025 coming up. Who's curious?
